description: A peaceful village in the Conomi Islands that has been under Arlong's control for eight years. Home to Nami, Nojiko, and the late Bellemère.

keyEvents.title: Arlong Pirates Arrive
keyEvents.description: Eight years ago, the Arlong Pirates arrived demanding tribute from all residents.
keyEvents.significance: The event that changed the village's fate and placed it under Arlong's tyranny.

keyEvents.title: Nezumi Arrives to Steal Nami's Treasure
keyEvents.description: Corrupt Marine Captain Nezumi comes to the village to confiscate Nami's savings.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the village is trapped between Arlong's tyranny and Marine corruption.

statusHistory.reason: Shown in flashback as peaceful before Arlong's arrival
Under Arlong's control and tribute system for eight years

description: The home where Bellemère raised Nami and Nojiko in Cocoyasi Village. A modest house adjacent to the tangerine grove.

keyEvents.title: Bellemère's Choice
keyEvents.description: The location where Bellemère chose to pay tribute for her daughters instead of herself.
keyEvents.significance: The site of one of the most important decisions in Nami's backstory.

keyEvents.title: Bellemère's Murder
keyEvents.description: Arlong murders Bellemère in front of her daughters at their home.
keyEvents.significance: The tragic event that occurs at what should have been a safe family home.

statusHistory.reason: Still standing and inhabited by Nojiko after Bellemère's death

name.japanese: ベルメールのみかん畑

description: The tangerine grove cultivated by Bellemère where she worked to support her family. After her death, the grove is maintained by Nojiko and represents Bellemère's legacy.

keyEvents.title: Introduction to the Tangerine Grove
keyEvents.description: Shown as the peaceful place where Bellemère raised her daughters and made a living.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the family home and Bellemère's hard work to provide for Nami and Nojiko.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Hidden Treasure Found
keyEvents.description: Nezumi discovers Nami's treasure buried in the tangerine grove and confiscates it.
keyEvents.significance: The place where Nami hid eight years of savings, now violated by corrupt Marines.

statusHistory.reason: Maintained by Nojiko as Bellemère's legacy

description: The headquarters of the Arlong Pirates in the Conomi Islands. A fortress-like structure where Arlong rules over the region and where Nami is forced to work.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Eight Years at Arlong Park
keyEvents.description: Revealed that Nami has been imprisoned here for eight years, forced to draw maps for Arlong.
keyEvents.significance: The prison where Nami has spent her adolescence in servitude.
